name: ultimate-hybrid-platform
description: Plateforme ultime de 6 applications hybrides avec tests BDD

scripts.install:apps: for app in apps/*/; do (cd "$app" && npm install --legacy-peer-deps); done
scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm run start:math4kids" "npm run start:unitflip" "npm run start:budgetcron" "npm run start:ai4kids" "npm run start:multiai" "npm run start:digital4kids"
scripts.build:all: for app in apps/*/; do (cd "$app" && npm run build); done
scripts.test:unit: for app in apps/*/; do (cd "$app" && npm test); done
scripts.test:all: npm run test:unit && npm run test:e2e && npm run test:bdd
scripts.android:all: for app in apps/*/; do (cd "$app" && npm run android 2>/dev/null || echo "Android build failed for $app"); done
scripts.ios:all: for app in apps/*/; do (cd "$app" && npm run ios 2>/dev/null || echo "iOS build failed for $app"); done
scripts.lint: for app in apps/*/; do (cd "$app" && npm run lint 2>/dev/null || echo "Lint not configured for $app"); done
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules apps/*/node_modules apps/*/dist apps/*/build apps/*/out
